issue.title: random_access_iterator semantic constraints accidentally promote difference type using unary negate

discussion.p: Unary minus can do integer promotion. That is not the intent here.
Status to Tentatively Ready and priority to 0 after five positive votes on the reflector.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4830.
